command
Class Command

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--command.Command
Direct Known Subclasses:
History, Redo, Rotate, SetColor, Translate, Undo
public abstract class Command
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable

Base class of all commands.

Constructor Detail

Command

Method Detail

doit

public boolean doit(Square square)
Execution method of this command. In the base class, this method throws an exception. Perhaps this method should be abstract, but certain metacommands, such as "undo" or "history", do not have any meaningfull implementation of this method.
Parameters:
square - The square the command applies to.
Returns:
Never. It throws an exception.

undoit

public boolean undoit(Square square)
Reverse execution method of this command. In the base class, this method throws an exception. Perhaps this method should be abstract, but certain metacommands, such as "undo" or "history", do not have any meaningfull implementation of this method.
Parameters:
square - The square the command applies to.
Returns:
Never. It throws an exception.

Standard shallow cloning method.

clone in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
A clone of this object.
